price: Hakika Mimi ndiye Mola wako Mlezi! Basi vua viatu vyako. Kwani upo katika bonde takatifu la T'uwa.
arabic: إِنِّيٓ أَنَا۠ رَبُّكَ فَٱخۡلَعۡ نَعۡلَيۡكَ إِنَّكَ بِٱلۡوَادِ ٱلۡمُقَدَّسِ طُوٗى

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: innī anā rabbuka fa-ikh'laʿ naʿlayka innaka bil-wādi al-muqadasi ṭuwan
